title: How to Make Fake Cuts Using Makeup

steps.title: Cleanse the skin where the cut will appear.
steps.content: Cleanse the skin where the cut will appear.

steps.title: Trace the wound with black or brown eyeliner.
steps.content: Trace the wound with black or brown eyeliner. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add blood using bright red lipstick or fake blood.
steps.content: Add blood using bright red lipstick or fake blood. Trace the wound, covering and overlapping the traced area. Be sure to apply thickly. You could also use nail polish for this step. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Apply a layer of clear, shiny lip gloss to make the bleeding appear fresh.
steps.content: Apply a layer of clear, shiny lip gloss to make the bleeding appear fresh. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Apply a little blush around the wound to make it appear sore.
steps.content: Apply a little blush around the wound to make it appear sore. [4] X Research source
